# ContactAccessButton.Style

**Structure**

A type that customizes the style of a contact access button.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Style
```

## Overview

This type accounts for a contact access button’s visual traits like color and sizing of the contact image. Set the style of a contact access button with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/contactAccessButtonStyle(_:)] view modifier.

## Creating a style instance

- **init(imageTrailingEdgePadding:imageWidth:imageColor:)**: Creates a contact access button with the provided styling values.

## Working with common styles

- **automatic**: A style that provides the default system styling of a contact access button.
